description:
Executive Assistant – $100k-$110k
Our client, a premier international finance firm in DTLA, is looking to hire a proactive and detail-oriented Executive Assistant. This role will provide crucial administrative support to a team of executives, ensuring smooth and efficient daily operations.
Responsibilities include managing calendars, coordinating meetings, handling correspondence, arranging domestic and international travel, preparing expense reports, assisting with special projects, and completing other tasks as assigned.
Employees at this renowned firm enjoy competitive salaries, generous bonuses, excellent benefits, hybrid schedules, and many other company perks.
Requirements:
  • 5+ years of experience supporting multiple executives
  • Background in professional services (finance ideal)
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills

Interested and qualified candidates are encouraged to apply today. No calls, please.
